title: Bug 23028EC: Tab unindent does not work
description: Bug 23028EC: Tab unindent does not work
OB: select a block of text in the Java editor press Tab and the whole block will be indented now press Shift+Tab and focus will be reassigned instead of unindenting theblock
EB: select a block of text in the Java editor press Tab and the whole block will be indented now press Shift+Tab and focus will be reassigned instead of unindenting theblock
